name: Complete any scenario without using any healing items or rest locations (inns, tents, etc.)
Go to 2nd Div.
Talk to the Lord of Rings
Use AsuraRevenge without dying
Obtain 3 SanctuaryStones
Kill a full party via Maelstrom's instant death condition
Purchase an item from pzkwV
Win the Duel
Complete any scenario without recruiting or using additional characters
Watch the skeleton dance in Nelson
Defeat Hell'sLord without using any magic
Have a palm reading of Hamster, type Star
Learn every Arcane Magic spell
Clip out-of-bounds in the Ancient Ship
Defeat Jotnar
Look at a special magazine
Lock your Battle Rank
Defeat Orlouge without using any Mystic absorbs
Recruit Fuse
Duplicate a CometBlade
Fight the Foxy Sisters at least once
Perform Takonomics
Create a save file as Rouge
Perform the Scattered Petals combo (Blizzard+MoonlightCut+Tres Flores)
Turn a monster into a Mariche
